physical_appearance:\This print depicts the island of Ternate and the coastal settlements
 as well as ships sailing near it. The title of the print is displayed at the top centre. At the background of the print is a volcano erupting. Smoke and fire can be seen emanating from its crater. The print is separated into a larger and smaller part. For the smaller part
 a map of the fortress
 \\Gamma-Lamma\\
subject_terms_1:is depicted. In the larger part volcanic eruptions ships coastal settlements forts landscape (representations)
subject_terms_2:a pier is shown to be extending from the coastline.The print is numbered from one to nine at certain areas Ternate (Dutch East Indies: Residency) Nederlandsche Oost-Indische Compagnie Volcanic eruptions Coastal settlements Fortress Prints Landscapes Ternate Island (Indonesia)
subject_terms_3:and these numbers serve as footnotes which are represented at the bottom.\
subject_terms_4:colonial settlements
context_1:Colonization

metadata.physical_appearance: "This print depicts the island of Ternate and the coastal settlements, as well as ships sailing near it. The title of the print is displayed at the top centre. At the background of the print is a volcano erupting. Smoke and fire can be seen emanating from its crater. The print is separated into a larger and smaller part. For the smaller part, a map of the fortress, ""Gamma-Lamma""
metadata.subject_terms_1: is depicted. In the larger part volcanic eruptions ships coastal settlements forts landscape (representations)
metadata.subject_terms_2: a pier is shown to be extending from the coastline.The print is numbered from one to nine at certain areas Ternate (Dutch East Indies: Residency) Nederlandsche Oost-Indische Compagnie Volcanic eruptions Coastal settlements Fortress Prints Landscapes Ternate Island (Indonesia)
metadata.subject_terms_3: and these numbers serve as footnotes which are represented at the bottom."
